text: Inuka (Inuit for "Silent Stalker") (26 December 1990 â€“ 25 April 2018) was a male polar bear and one of the mascots of the Singapore Zoo. He was the first polar bear to be born in the tropics. In early 2018, it was announced that Inuka's health was failing. After a second examination, Inuka was euthanized at the zoo on 25 April 2018 at the age of 27.Inuka, first polar bear born in the tropics, is put down ==References== Category:1990 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths by euthanasia Category:Individual animals Category:Singapore
title: Inuka
